channel.title: PI wearing armor in the starter
channel.description: Ok guys, I have my starter setup so you are wearing full iron when you login, but, it does not show the armor until you like wear a sword or put a ring on, etc. how would I go about fixing this?

item.title: PI wearing armor in the starter
item.dc:creator: @mrnessie mrnessie
item.description:
@mrnessie wrote:

Thanks guys, I am on mobile ATM, can’t get on PCM yet

Read full topic

item.title: PI wearing armor in the starter
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:2, topic:547034”]I believe you can use

You would put that after whenever you tell it to equip the armor. Also it would help if we saw your code.[/quote]
Yes, something similar to this is needed.
When you’re putting the armor on the player for the starter, you’re only doing it server sided.
the requestUpdates method tells the client “hey, shit changed on the server, so you need to change your look based on these values [some values like player appearance]”.

Read full topic
item.source: PI wearing armor in the starter
